Pick your favourite recipes

Source: R/set_favourites.R
set_favourites.Rd

Pick your favourite recipes

set_favourites(recipebook, fav_indexes = NULL)

Arguments

recipebook

tibble::tibble() containing the recipe information, possibly created using create_recipebook().
fav_indexes

integer() set of indexes that correspond to the recipes that you want to favourite.

Value

tibble::tibble() containing recipebook with selected favourites.

Examples

set_favourites(recipebook_example, fav_indexes = c(1, 2, 3))
#> Warning: fav_indexes must be an integer, coercing
#> # A tibble: 26 × 3
#>    names                                            ingredients fav  
#>    <chr>                                            <list>      <lgl>
#>  1 Akoori Eggs with Spinach & Potato                <Ingrdnts>  TRUE 
#>  2 Crispy Duck with Fava Beans & Caramelised Onions <Ingrdnts>  TRUE 
#>  3 Chicken with Rosemary Plumns                     <Ingrdnts>  TRUE 
#>  4 Chickpea & Sweet Potato Masala                   <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#>  5 Gaucho Steaks with Chimichurri Salad             <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#>  6 Chipotle Bean Taco Salad                         <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#>  7 Steak Tagliata & Roasted Potato Salad            <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#>  8 Sweetcorn & Spring Onion Orzotto                 <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#>  9 Squash, Corn & Tomatillo Tostadas                <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#> 10 Chipotle, Corn & Cheese Baked Rice               <Ingrdnts>  FALSE
#> # … with 16 more rows
